org.apache.hcatalog.mapreduce
Class MultiOutputFormat.JobConfigurer

Object
  MultiOutputFormat.JobConfigurer
Enclosing class:
MultiOutputFormat
public static class MultiOutputFormat.JobConfigurer
extends Object

Class that supports configuration of the job for multiple output formats.

Method Summary

Method Detail

addOutputFormat

public void addOutputFormat(String alias,
                            Class<? extends OutputFormat> outputFormatClass,
                            Class<?> keyClass,
                            Class<?> valueClass)
                     throws IOException
Add a OutputFormat configuration to the Job with a alias name.

Parameters:
alias - the name to be given to the OutputFormat configuration
outputFormatClass - OutputFormat class
keyClass - the key class for the output data
valueClass - the value class for the output data
Throws:
IOException

getJob

public Job getJob(String alias)
Get the Job configuration for a OutputFormat defined by the alias name. The job returned by this method should be passed to the OutputFormat for any configuration instead of the Job that will be submitted to the JobClient.

Parameters:
alias - the name used for the OutputFormat during addOutputFormat
Returns:
Job

configure

public void configure()
Configure the job with the multiple output formats added. This method should be called after all the output formats have been added and configured and before the job submission.
